mapper.update: UPDATE course SET cname =#{cname}, num=#{num},remake=#{remake},weekday=#{weekday},time=#{time},address=#{address},lesson=#{lesson},status="1" where cid=#{cid}
update course set num=num-1 where cid =#{cid}
mapper.select: select c.cid,c.cname,su.username,c.num,c.remake,c.weekday,c.time,c.address,c.lesson from course c left join source s on c.cid = s.cid left join easyuser su on c.uid=su.id where s.username = #{stuName} and c.cname like #{cname} and c.uid in (SELECT id from easyuser WHERE username like #{username})
mapper.update: update course set num=num+1 where cid =#{cid}
mapper.select: select num from course where cid =#{cid}
